Options XML file

All the options you can change in the launcher window are stored in a xml files called data/saves/options.xml 

   
    
      Name of SnapShot
      OpenGL15
      
        Yes
        Yes
      
      
        NomdeMonServeur
      
    
    
      false
      1024X768
Last modified: Sat Oct 21 08:49:05 CEST 2006

The root element is options. It can have one lastuse and more than opne snapshot childs. A snapshot is a graphic configuration wich can be save and restore with the Launcher.
